title: Dollarback
author: Dollarback
content: 📣📣Hello dear investors.📣📣As part of the Bounty campaign and in conjunction with our Burncontest, we have decided to launch a separate sale via our homepage.Distribution of the proceeds from the sale:- 20% will go into the course to increase the price- 80% will go into liquidity to stabilise the situation👇Refferallink with 10% bonus !!👇The sale will be published on the website just like our private sale/ICO and is eligible for the burncontest.The best part is, we are offering you the opportunity of a 10% refferal bonus which will be paid directly in BNB to your wallet.This encourages our Bountyhunters to share the Refferallink even more and especially in larger groups and earn Bnb directly.Of course, everyone can participate in the sale and get a Refferallink, but you have to invest any amount.So it is worthwhile for new and existing investors alike to inform their friends, acquaintances and families.▶️▶️ The link to the sale ◀️◀️https://dollarback.io/sale.html▶️▶️ The Burn Address◀️◀️0x000000000000000000000000000000000000dEaD🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥The DollarBack team wishes you much fun and success in sharing your refferallink.
